sys_remote_update_set.description:
Problem : There are several instances where a B&B incident has failed to create a Newsignature case. When the short description contains a quote, it causes the json payload to become malformed.
Fix : Update script to ensure the Json payload is properly formed when the Short Description contains "quotes" .
Affected Business Rule : Create New Signature Case
sys_remote_update_set.name: New Signature - Requests 4
